functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostIsStarted
functionSummary.description: This function returns whether the USB host module has been started.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostStart
functionSummary.description: This function initializes the USB 2.0 host stack.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostStop
functionSummary.description: This function de-inits the USB host stack.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostPortEnable
functionSummary.description: This function enables the USB host port.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostPortDisable
functionSummary.description: Disable the USB host port.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostGetPortStatus
functionSummary.description: This function retreives the current port status.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostPortReset
functionSummary.description: This function resets the USB host port.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostPortSuspend
functionSummary.description: This function suspends the USB host port.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostPortResume
functionSummary.description: This function resusmes the previously suspended USB host port.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostGetFrameNumber
functionSummary.description: This function gets the current frame number to be used.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostGetDeviceAddress
functionSummary.description: This function gets the current downstream peripheral address.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostSetDeviceAddress
functionSummary.description: This function sets the current downstream peripheral address.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostEpAdd
functionSummary.description: This function adds an endpoint to the scheduler.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostEpRemove
functionSummary.description: This function removes and endpoint from the scheduler.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostEpReset
functionSummary.description: This function resets an endpoint state.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostSendSetupRqt
functionSummary.description: This function does EP0 setup transfer handling.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostEpSetXfer
functionSummary.description: This function starts a transfer for all non-EP0 endpoints and sets the transfer parameters for EP0. This function is relavant for EP0 only if the ep0LowLevelControl is set to CyTrue while starting the host stack. If the API is invoked for EP0 when the ep0LowLevelControl is CyFalse, then the behaviour is undefined as this API will be used by the library for setting up the EP0 transfers.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostEp0BeginXfer
functionSummary.description: This function enables and starts transfer on EP0. The function is relavant only if the ep0LowLevelControl is set to CyTrue while starting the host stack. If the API is invoked for EP0 when the ep0LowLevelControl is CyFalse, then the behaviour is undefined as this API will be used by the library for setting up the EP0 transfers.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostEpAbort
functionSummary.description: This function aborts pending transfers on selected endpoint.

functionSummary.name: CyU3PUsbHostEpWaitForCompletion
functionSummary.description: This function waits for the current endpoint transfer to complete.
